1. version 1.0 = First Version 2. version 1.1 = Fixing in submission of expiration (If out of stock) 3. version 1.2 = Temporary change of GPSLocator class and create check box for out of stock 4. version 1.3 = Create method for deletion of image from MyFolder/Images and Pictures Path 1/21/2019 5. version 1.3.1 = Create an default error message in login 1/22/2019 6. version 1.3.2 = Removed downloading of master data in Main Activity and Put in separate activity (Download Data) 2/27/2019 7. version 1.4 = Offline Inventory Saving 3/19/2019 8. version 1.4.1 = Adjustment in Downloading data, set max retry in material balance 3/22/2019
1.First Database Design 2.Additional customer_code field in material_balance table, New table Offline_Inventory_Header
